name: Study Resources
content:
Get started on free GED® online studying and more with these online GED resources. Free online GED study can help you improve weak areas in your GED skills and supplement your studying, but many learners need a more comprehensive study program to get ready. The GED Academy online preparation program gives you a complete, easy, step-by-step program to get you to your GED diploma.

GED Practice Questions

Sample GED Test Questions

The makers of the GED test provide free sample test questions from each section of the GED test including Language Arts: Writing, Social Studies Language Arts: Reading, Science, and Mathematics.

Vocabulary and Language Skills

Freerice.com Vocabulary Builder

Help end world hunger while you improve your vocabulary. Answer vocabulary questions, and Freerice.com will donate rice to those in need for every question you get right.

Vocabulary Building Games

Play free online games to increase your vocabulary, an essential skill for improving reading.

English Language Learners and Pre-GED

U.S.A. Learns Pre-GED Instruction

U.S.A. Learns is a free site designed for adults with limited English language skills who cannot attend a traditional classroom.

Pumarosa ESL Course for Spanish Speaking Adults

Pumarosa is FREE a bilingual, phonetic and interactive ESL course for Spanish speaking adults.

Instant Immersion English Software

This dynamic 5-disk language learning system on CD-ROM is an option for those that need more than free online learning. Use your computer to learn how to speak and understand basic English. It’s an inexpensive program for ESL students.

Math Study Resources

Math.com: The World of Math Online

Math.com has free online study resources for practicing math from fractions and decimals to calculus.

Secret Worlds: The Universe Within

Learn about measurement and scientific notation by comparing the distances of the natural world.

Using the Scientific Calculator

This online interactive tutorial goes over the Texas Instruments TI-30XS MultiView™ Scientific Calculator that is used on the GED mathematics test.

Texas Instruments TI-30XS MultiView™ Scientific Calculator

Your testing center will provide a Texas Instruments TI-30XS on-screen calculator when you take your GED test.

Social Studies Study Resources

Ben’s Guide to U.S. Government

Learn high-school level U.S. government concepts online by exploring Ben’s Guide, which includes information on important historical documents and the U.S. system of government.

Science Study Resources

Jefferson Lab Science Games and Puzzles

Increase your science knowledge with games and puzzles on the Jefferson Lab website.

Advanced GED Study and College Prep

INeedAPencil.com Free SAT Prep

Looking for scholarships and advanced scores? Sign up for free SAT-level lessons and exam questions to take your studying to the next level.

Improve Your Study and Job Skills

What’s Your Learning Style?

Use this online questionnaire to learn more about how you learn. Knowing how you learn best will improve your study skills and help make your GED test preparation easy and fun.

Learning Styles Inventory

Try this additional learning styles questionnaire to get more information on how you learn and how you can improve your study techniques to learn faster an easier.

Free Online Typing Lessons

Get free online typing lessons and exercises from Peter’s Online Typing Course. Improving your typing will improve your study skills and job skills.

Mavis Beacon Typing Software

This is the best software available for improving typing skills. It’s inexpensive and very easy to use. Buy direct from Amazon.com for the lowest price.
